feature_short_description: Automated file transfer protocol integration for bulk invoice uploads and exports
feature_description:
## FTP Integration

FTP Integration allows you to automatically upload and download invoices using the File Transfer Protocol, enabling seamless integration with legacy systems and bulk file operations.

### Capabilities
- Automated FTP server connections
- Scheduled file uploads and downloads
- Bulk invoice processing
- Secure SFTP support
- Directory monitoring and auto-import

### Use Cases
- Bulk invoice uploads from external vendors
- Automated exports to accounting systems
- Integration with legacy EDI systems
- Scheduled batch processing

### Setup Requirements
- FTP/SFTP server credentials
- Directory path configuration
- Schedule frequency settings
